levels.description: Attack interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, attacks all blocked enemies, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>; deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_ex:0%}</> ATK as extra Physical damage when attacking enemies with HP percentage equal to or higher than self, otherwise lose <@ba.vdown>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> of HP
